pullrequest.title: Fix size of coke can, 12cm instead of 31cm height

content.raw:
Seems reasonable.

‌

Removing the offset from the inertial makes sense. I would add that weird offset scaled by the inch to mm conversion to the `<visual>` and `<collision>`. It looks like the mesh is offset from the center of mass when viewed orthographically from above.

‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1517817813-coke_can_top_ortho.png)
content.html:
Seems reasonable.
